Title: Relates to creating the proprietary college tuition reimbursement account
Summary: Relates to degree-granting proprietary colleges; creates the proprietary college tuition reimbursement account for the refund of tuition paid by eligible students asserting certain violations; establishes an assessment to be paid by proprietary schools to fund the account.
LawCode: Add ยง212-d, Ed L; add ยง97-m, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to degree-granting proprietary colleges; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the proprietary college tuition reimbursement account
